reviewText: I forgot how great this movie was. I had only seen the movie once years ago and was pleased when I found it on Amazon. The movie is about a single mother and a widowed father who meet, fall in love, get married not to mention there are obstacles they have to overcome but they do and triumph in the end. This is a must see. Love It. Thanks Amazon.

reviewText: This was a girl story, let's face it. Rich widowed doctor meets successful tv personality and they fall in love and get married despite all the difficulties their different lives caused them to bear. It was an excellent DVD and have watched it more than once.

reviewText: I like this movie a lot because it is a very touching love story and I watch it a lot and also Michael Nouri and Cheryl Ladd are also one of my most favorite actors and I like their character roles. I am sad that Marie Dupret needs a heart transplant, also I am glad Peter Hallam has fire Mrs. Haun she was not a housekeeper in the movie. Raquel was the housekeeper and she resepcts every one including Melanie and her twin daughters who she looks up to and like a mother figure to them. I can't believe Mark and Val had sex if they knew they were going to be a family and also went to an abortion clinic to get an abortion with an unexperienced doctor who does not know what he or she is doing. I am glad Pam has given Melanie a chance and Melanie given birth to twins again and moved into a huge house.
